snippet: Rafael Nadal will play in an exhibition tournament in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates, at the end of the month after a six-month break to recover from a knee injury.
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal will play in an exhibition tournament in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates, at the end of the month after a six-month break to recover from a knee injury.

headline.seo: Rafael Nadal to Return in Abu Dhabi
headline.main: Nadal to Return in Abu Dhabi
headline.print_headline: Nadal to Return in Abu Dhabi
